IP_SYN_4_style_9:
DIAGNOSIS: Malacia and stent blockage.
PROCEDURE: Rigid endoscopy, prosthesis extraction, cryo-ablation, and mucus clearance.
DETAILS: We cleared heavy secretions from the lungs. The indwelling prosthesis was extracted. We used freezing therapy to reduce the tissue growth in the main bronchi. The airway exhibited collapse. A stent-free period is planned.
